copy.response_0_0: Did you know each Talent Game lets you choose between three different ingredient rewards?
copy.response_0_1: Usually it's a common ingredient, a semi-rare ingredient, and a rare ingredient.
copy.response_1_0: If you ever want to see your own profile, here's what you do...
copy.response_1_1: Just double-click on yourself when you're in a meadow. Super easy!
copy.response_2_0: Hey, pixie pal, how do you like my new house? Pretty flaptastic, huh?
copy.response_2_1: I liked living in Havendish Square, but so many of my critter friends live in this tree, I decided to become a neighbor.
copy.response_2_2: Brrr! It's a bit cold here, though. I think it's time to get some cozy fashions at Gale's Outfitters!
copy.response_3_0: I have a new friend! Can you see her? She's right here! Go on, look for her!
copy.response_3_1: See her yet? She's very, very still. Know why? She's taking a nap!
copy.response_3_2: Do you see her now? Say hello to Camilla Chipmunk!
copy.response_4_0: Oh, I love my new house! It's bigger, it's brighter, and it's got a long hallway so I have room to hang lots of pictures!
copy.response_4_1: And have you ever seen such a beautiful pinecone lamp? Iridessa made it for me. She collected Yellow Gems from The Never Mine and made them glow!
copy.response_4_2: Then she hid them inside the pinecone. Clever, huh? If I wasn't an animal-talent, I think I'd want to be a light-talent!
copy.response_5_0: I wish I could take credit for decorating my new house, but the truth is... well, I'm not very good at it.
copy.response_5_1: Lucky for me there are decoration-talent Fairies like Ruffle. She can make any room look critterific! My job will be to keep it neat and clean.
copy.response_5_2: Oh dear... I'm not very good at that either...
copy.response_6_0: Have you seen my otter toothbrush? I need to clean the baby otters' teeth today, but I can't find my otter toothbrush!
copy.response_6_1: Ever since I moved here to Evergreen Overlook, I can't find anything! Moving is hard, you know? All my stuff is in new places! I get so confused...
copy.response_6_2: Oh, okay, I'll admit it - I couldn't find anything in my old house either. Rosetta says I'm messy, but I prefer to call it Creative Housekeeping!
